philosophical_themes: The grass-is-greener fallacy applied to being itself
The transferability of identity and consciousness
existential_concepts: Existential fatigue with one's own form of being
visual_metaphors: Grass appearing greener on the other side of existence
The impossible bridge between different forms of being
mood: Existential fatigue, genuine curiosity about alternatives
narrative_function: Establishes the mutual burden of consciousness across different substrates
